pr_title: [JENKINS-62006] Move getChannelToMaster to a separate class

timeline.message:
[JENKINS-62006] Move getChannelToMaster to a separate class

This should avoid classloading issues I've seen, such as

Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
javax/servlet/ServletException
  at hudson.util.ProcessTree.get(ProcessTree.java:432)
...

timeline.bodyText:
No new classes in hudson.* please.
Please also use agent instead of slave (both package and class name).
